properties.query:
let q0=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessName endswith "\\plink.exe" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains ":127.0.0.1:3389") or ((TargetProcessName endswith "\\plink.exe" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains ":3389") and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -P 443" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -P 22")))|extend RuleId="f38ce0b9-5e97-4b47-a211-7dc8d8b871da"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_plink_susp_tunneling.yml"|extend RuleTitle="Potential RDP Tunneling Via SSH Plink"|extend RuleDescription="Execution of plink to perform data exfiltration and tunneling";
let q1=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (((TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershell.exe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwsh.exe") or (TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShell.Exe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pwsh.dll")) and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Add-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ConvertTo-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Disable-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Enable-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Export-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Get-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Grant-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Install-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Invoke-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Join-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "New-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Open-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Read-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Register-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Restore-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Search-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Send-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Set-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Start-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Update-AADInt"))|extend RuleId="c86500e9-a645-4680-98d7-f882c70c1ea3"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_aadinternals_cmdlets_execution.yml"|extend RuleTitle="AADInternals PowerShell Cmdlets Execution - ProccessCreation"|extend RuleDescription="Detects ADDInternals Cmdlet execution. A tool for administering Azure AD and Office 365. Which can be abused by threat actors to attack Azure AD or Office 365.";
let q2=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessCommandLine contains "System.Management.Automation.AmsiUtils" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "amsiInitFailed") or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "[Ref].Assembly.GetType" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SetValue($null,$true)" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains "NonPublic,Static"))|extend RuleId="30edb182-aa75-42c0-b0a9-e998bb29067c"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_amsi_init_failed_bypass.yml"|extend RuleTitle="Potential AMSI Bypass Via .NET Reflection"|extend RuleDescription="Detects Request to \"amsiInitFailed\" that can be used to disable AMSI Scanning";
let q3=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (((TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershell.exe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwsh.exe") or (TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShell.EXE" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pwsh.dll")) and ((TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -e" and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains " JAB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " SUVYI" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " SQBFAFgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " aQBlAHgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " aWV4I" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " IAA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " IAB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " UwB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " cwB")) or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains ".exe -ENCOD " or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " BA^J e-")) and (not(TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -ExecutionPolicy remotesigned ")))|extend RuleId="ca2092a1-c273-4878-9b4b-0d60115bf5ea"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_encoded_cmd.yml"|extend RuleTitle="Suspicious Encoded PowerShell Command Line"|extend RuleDescription="Detects suspicious powershell process starts with base64 encoded commands (e.g. Emotet)";
let q4=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "OjpGcm9tQmFzZTY0U3RyaW5n"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "o6RnJvbUJhc2U2NFN0cmluZ"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "6OkZyb21CYXNlNjRTdHJpbm"
| where ( or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "OgA6AEYAcgBvAG0AQgBhAHMAZQA2ADQAUwB0AHIAaQBuAGcA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "oAOgBGAHIAbwBtAEIAYQBzAGUANgA0AFMAdAByAGkAbgBnA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "6ADoARgByAG8AbQBCAGEAcwBlADYANABTAHQAcgBpAG4AZw"))|extend RuleId="fdb62a13-9a81-4e5c-a38f-ea93a16f6d7c"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_frombase64string.yml"|extend RuleTitle="PowerShell Base64 Encoded FromBase64String Cmdlet"|extend RuleDescription="Detects usage of a base64 encoded \"FromBase64String\" cmdlet in a process command line";
let q5=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYIChb"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWCAoW"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVggKF"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4IChb"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleCAoW"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXggKF"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4IChOZX"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleCAoTmV3"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXggKE5ld"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYIChOZX"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWCAoTmV3"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVggKE5ld"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYKF"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWChb"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVgoW"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4KF"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleChb"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXgoW"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4KE5ld"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleChOZX"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXgoTmV3"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYKE5ld"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWChOZX"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVgoTmV3"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SUVYKCgn"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lFWCgoJ"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JRVgoKC"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aWV4KCgn"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "lleCgoJ"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pZXgoKC"
| where (( or  or  or  or  or  or  or  or  or ) or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SQBFAFgAIAAoAFsA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kARQBYACAAKABbA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JAEUAWAAgACgAWw" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aQBlAHgAIAAoAFsA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kAZQB4ACAAKABbA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pAGUAeAAgACgAWw" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "aQBlAHgAIAAoAE4AZQB3A" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kAZQB4ACAAKABOAGUAdw" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pAGUAeAAgACgATgBlAHcA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SQBFAFgAIAAoAE4AZQB3A" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kARQBYACAAKABOAGUAdw" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JAEUAWAAgACgATgBlAHcA"))|extend RuleId="88f680b8-070e-402c-ae11-d2914f2257f1"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_iex.yml"|extend RuleTitle="PowerShell Base64 Encoded IEX Cmdlet"|extend RuleDescription="Detects usage of a base64 encoded \"IEX\" cmdlet in a process command line";
let q6=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (((TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershell.exe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwsh.exe") or (TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShell.EXE" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pwsh.dll")) and TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -e" and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SQBuAHYAbwBrAGUALQ" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "kAbgB2AG8AawBlAC0A" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JAG4AdgBvAGsAZQAtA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SW52b2tlL" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ludm9rZS" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "JbnZva2Ut"))|extend RuleId="6385697e-9f1b-40bd-8817-f4a91f40508e"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_invoke.yml"|extend RuleTitle="PowerShell Base64 Encoded Invoke Keyword"|extend RuleDescription="Detects UTF-8 and UTF-16 Base64 encoded powershell 'Invoke-' calls";
let q7=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "QWRkLU1wUHJlZmVyZW5jZS"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "FkZC1NcFByZWZlcmVuY2Ug"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "BZGQtTXBQcmVmZXJlbmNlI"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "U2V0LU1wUHJlZmVyZW5jZS"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "NldC1NcFByZWZlcmVuY2Ug"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "TZXQtTXBQcmVmZXJlbmNlI"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "YWRkLW1wcHJlZmVyZW5jZS"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "FkZC1tcHByZWZlcmVuY2Ug"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "hZGQtbXBwcmVmZXJlbmNlI"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "c2V0LW1wcHJlZmVyZW5jZS"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "NldC1tcHByZWZlcmVuY2Ug"
| where TargetProcessCommandLine contains "zZXQtbXBwcmVmZXJlbmNlI"
| where (( or  or  or ) or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "QQBkAGQALQBNAHAAUAByAGUAZgBlAHIAZQBuAGMAZQAgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "EAZABkAC0ATQBwAFAAcgBlAGYAZQByAGUAbgBjAGUAIA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "BAGQAZAAtAE0AcABQAHIAZQBmAGUAcgBlAG4AYwBlACAA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "UwBlAHQALQBNAHAAUAByAGUAZgBlAHIAZQBuAGMAZQAgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "MAZQB0AC0ATQBwAFAAcgBlAGYAZQByAGUAbgBjAGUAIA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "TAGUAdAAtAE0AcABQAHIAZQBmAGUAcgBlAG4AYwBlACAA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "YQBkAGQALQBtAHAAcAByAGUAZgBlAHIAZQBuAGMAZQAgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "EAZABkAC0AbQBwAHAAcgBlAGYAZQByAGUAbgBjAGUAIA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "hAGQAZAAtAG0AcABwAHIAZQBmAGUAcgBlAG4AYwBlACAA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "cwBlAHQALQBtAHAAcAByAGUAZgBlAHIAZQBuAGMAZQAgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "MAZQB0AC0AbQBwAHAAcgBlAGYAZQByAGUAbgBjAGUAIA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "zAGUAdAAtAG0AcABwAHIAZQBmAGUAcgBlAG4AYwBlACAA"))|extend RuleId="c6fb44c6-71f5-49e6-9462-1425d328aee3"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_mppreference.yml"|extend RuleTitle="Powershell Base64 Encoded MpPreference Cmdlet"|extend RuleDescription="Detects base64 encoded \"MpPreference\" PowerShell cmdlet code that tries to modifies or tamper with Windows Defender AV";
let q8=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "WwBSAGUAZgBsAGUAYwB0AGkAbwBuAC4AQQBzAHMAZQBtAGIAbAB5AF0AOgA6AEwAbwBhAGQAKA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "sAUgBlAGYAbABlAGMAdABpAG8AbgAuAEEAcwBzAGUAbQBiAGwAeQBdADoAOgBMAG8AYQBkACgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "bAFIAZQBmAGwAZQBjAHQAaQBvAG4ALgBBAHMAcwBlAG0AYgBsAHkAXQA6ADoATABvAGEAZAAoA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "AFsAcgBlAGYAbABlAGMAdABpAG8AbgAuAGEAcwBzAGUAbQBiAGwAeQBdADoAOgAoACIATABvAGEAZAAiAC" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "BbAHIAZQBmAGwAZQBjAHQAaQBvAG4ALgBhAHMAcwBlAG0AYgBsAHkAXQA6ADoAKAAiAEwAbwBhAGQAIgAp" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "AWwByAGUAZgBsAGUAYwB0AGkAbwBuAC4AYQBzAHMAZQBtAGIAbAB5AF0AOgA6ACgAIgBMAG8AYQBkACIAK" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "WwBSAGUAZgBsAGUAYwB0AGkAbwBuAC4AQQBzAHMAZQBtAGIAbAB5AF0AOgA6ACgAIgBMAG8AYQBkACIAKQ" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "sAUgBlAGYAbABlAGMAdABpAG8AbgAuAEEAcwBzAGUAbQBiAGwAeQBdADoAOgAoACIATABvAGEAZAAiACkA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "bAFIAZQBmAGwAZQBjAHQAaQBvAG4ALgBBAHMAcwBlAG0AYgBsAHkAXQA6ADoAKAAiAEwAbwBhAGQAIgApA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "WwByAGUAZgBsAGUAYwB0AGkAbwBuAC4AYQBzAHMAZQBtAGIAbAB5AF0AOgA6AEwAbwBhAGQAKA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "sAcgBlAGYAbABlAGMAdABpAG8AbgAuAGEAcwBzAGUAbQBiAGwAeQBdADoAOgBMAG8AYQBkACgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "bAHIAZQBmAGwAZQBjAHQAaQBvAG4ALgBhAHMAcwBlAG0AYgBsAHkAXQA6ADoATABvAGEAZAAoA")|extend RuleId="62b7ccc9-23b4-471e-aa15-6da3663c4d59"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_reflection_assembly_load.yml"|extend RuleTitle="PowerShell Base64 Encoded Reflective Assembly Load"|extend RuleDescription="Detects base64 encoded .NET reflective loading of Assembly";
union q0, q1, q2, q3, q4, q5, q6, q7, q8;
